title: The Fascistic Attempt to Kill Free Speech | Guest: Ezra Levant | 1/31/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss how the ADL changed its definition of racism to fit its leftist political agenda. Multiple artists are following Neil Young’s footsteps in removing their music from Spotify to protest Joe Rogan. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins to update Glenn on the freedom convoy of Canadian truckers protesting COVID mandates and the media's reaction to it. Glenn warns of the advancement of technology when the elite attempts to take control over it. The Spotify/Joe Rogan controversy continues as free speech continues to be attacked. What rights are secured in the First Amendment? What are you doing to protect your assets if the American dollar collapses?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
